item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

fier12:

where it says defient in the command that means… only the player with that name of defiant can use ::update… and if that is your name try this in your server ::update 10 that means update after 10 sec’s.

I know this, I’m not asking how to use it, Im asking how to make it save everyones game when I do the command.

item.title: [PI][317] ::update help
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

I would like to make it so it saves everyone’s game when I do the command “::update” because i’m tired of having to tell everyone, and having people being away, or not listening, then getting rolled back and yelling at me for it. I know it must be one line of code to put in, and I would be very grateful(I can’t rep++ yet or I would) if you could help me put that in

Here’s my ::update command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("defiant")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();

Read full topic
